Latest News























It’s Time for the Annual UCR/AQMD Transportation Survey!



April 21, 2023



            As a large employer, UCR is mandated to administer an annual commute survey to its employees as part of South Coast Air Quality Management District’s (SCAQMD) Rule 2202. All employees (including student employees) are obligated to complete the short questionnaire...    





















Ride Metrolink Free on Earth Day



April 10, 2023



            Small acts like taking the train, can make an impact and contribute to a healthier, more sustainable world. Metrolink is encouraging people to take the train, skip traffic and enjoy a comfortable and convenient ride with a free ticket on...    





















Zipcar provides wheels when you want them!



March 16, 2023



            Have you noticed there’s more Zipcars on campus? Due to the high demand of car rentals on campus, Zipcar has delivered eight new vehicles to UCR. Zipcars are available to all students and staff for hourly or daily rental. Vehicles...    





















Vanpool Town Hall Meetings



February 16, 2023



            If you’re starting to work more frequently on campus and are re-thinking your commute, vanpooling might be a good option for you. Vanpooling can help you save on gas, reduce other out-of-pocket expenses, and can save you time. We’ve partnered...    





















Metrolink Spring Promotion



February 08, 2023



            Metrolink’s Spring Back to School Campaign encourages students, faculty and staff to take the train and leave their cars behind. Simply download the Metrolink Mobile App and register using your UCR email to receive two mobile round-trip tickets. Tickets will...
